data.title: Ian McShane shooting in Fuerteventura a movie called American Star
data.meta_description: Just received a few messages from a friend of mine, living on the island. Ian McShane is apparently at the airport and working on a movie that might be called "American Star". Right now, I have no ide
data.text:
Sam

Wannabe Legendary

Posts: 3,638

Threads: 223

Joined: Oct 2018

Reputation: 7,362

Just received a few messages from a friend of mine, living on the island. Ian McShane is apparently at the airport and working on a movie that might be called "American Star".

Right now, I have no idea if he's directing or acting, nor if the movie is about the (in)famous ship or some kind of celebrity due to the fact it's being shot at an airport.

Can't find any details online RN, will update if that changes.

Attached Files Thumbnail(s)

I Fuerteventura

Last one released March 2021 I think.

I've sent a message to a Spanish friend who works in film industry here, see if she knows anything...

Living my dream
